metadata.synopsis: Quick VB about the prisoners and the fate that awaits them. This is mainly used to draw attention to them as the players explore the prison area.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays when approaching the cells of MOO prison that contain prisoners.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Prisoners. I doubt they'll last long in here.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Careful. One wrong move and we'll be behind bars with them.
